> Heavy Modular Frame (1/min)
  # Alternate: Heavy Flexible Frame:
    : Needs
      - 5 Modular Frame(s) +
      - 3 Encased Industrial Beam(s) +
      - 20 Rubber(s) +
      - 104 Screws(s)
    > Produces > 1 Heavy Modular Frame per minute
      |- Modular Frame (5/min)
        # Alternate: Bolted Frame:
          : Needs
            - 7.5 Reinforced Iron Plate(s) +
            - 140 Screws(s)
